dc_title_s: Nansenbushū bankoku shōka no zu; Rōkashi.; Bankoku shōka no zu
dc_description_s: Wood block print. In Japanese. Shows the world based on Buddhist literature from India and China. Title in Nihon kohan chizu shūsei: Nansenbushū bankoku shōka no zu. Posted on panel title: Bankoku shōka no zu. 1 map; 115 x 145 cm., folded to 24 x 18 cm. This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
